### Next Gen HR & Pay Project Accessibility Conformance Testing
#### Notification of Amendment and Solicitation Period Extension
**Reference Number**: WS3736117690-Doc3749494204

**Publication Date**: November 15, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: December 16, 2022, 14:00 h
**Amendment Date**: December 9, 2022

**Background**
The Government of Canada's Next Generation Human Resources and Pay (NextGen HR and Pay) initiative is seeking Information Technology professional services to support accessibility conformance testing and test coordination for the NextGen HR and Pay platform. This bid solicitation is a request for proposal (RFP) to satisfy the requirement of Shared Services Canada (SSC) and is part of the Client's efforts to provide informed and appropriate recommendations for enterprise-wide HR and Pay systems through pilot testing of a user-centric, accessible, and flexible cloud-based solution.

**Scope of Work**
The successful bidder will provide Information Technology professional services on an as-and-when-requested basis to support accessibility conformance testing and test coordination for the NextGen HR and Pay platform.

**Solicitation Details**
The solicitation number is WS3736117690, and the proposal submission closing date is December 16, 2022, at 14:00 h. This solicitation is being issued under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact:
Ingrid Lorena Uzelac, PSPC/SPAC
Email: ingridlorena.uzelac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
